Record.ClassificationPath: Eye Diseases/Corneal Diseases/Corneal Dystrophies, Hereditary/Fuchs' Endothelial Dystrophy
Record.Description: Disorder caused by loss of endothelium of the central cornea. It is characterized by hyaline endothelial outgrowths on Descemet's membrane, epithelial blisters, reduced vision, and pain.
